name: Razorhide
tooltip:
Razorhide

All those who <snort> enter battle have need of protection. Their bones must be strong. Their skin tough. <snort> My tribe knows this as well, and to add to the natural protection our quills and hide give us, <snort> we often call upon Agamaggan to protect us from harm before we go to war.

Bring me 4 blood shards <snort> and I will grant you the same protection.

Requirements:
- Blood Shard x 4
